subConfigs.name: CWDTEN[2]
subConfigs.description:
Watchdog Timer Hardware Enable Control Bits.
CWDTEN[2:0] is CONFIG0[31][4][3],
011 = WDT hardware enable function is active. WDT clock is always on except chip enters
Power-down mode. When chip enter Power-down mode, WDT clock is always on if
CWDTPDEN is 0 or WDT clock is controlled by OSC10K_EN (PWRCON[3]) if
CWDTPDEN is 1. Please refer to bit field description of CWDTPDEN.
111 = WDT hardware enable function is inactive.
Others = WDT hardware enable function is active. WDT clock is always on.
optionDescription: CONFIG0[31] = 0
CONFIG0[31] = 1

subConfigs.name: CWDTPDEN
optionDescription: 0 = Watchdog Timer clock kept enabled when chip enters Power-down.
1 = Watchdog Timer clock is controlled by LIRCEN (CLK_PWRCTL[3]) when chip enters Power-down.

subConfigs.name: CFGXT1
optionDescription: 0 = PF[4:3] pins are configured as GPIO pins.

1 =PF[4:3] pins are configured as external 4~24 MHz external high speed crystal oscillator
(HXT) pins.

subConfigs.name: CFOSC
subConfigs.description: CPU Clock Source Selection After Reset
optionDescription: 0 = 4~24 MHz external high speed crystal oscillator (HXT).
1 = 24 MHz, the internal high speed RC oscillator divided by 2 (HIRC/2).

subConfigs.name: CBODEN
optionDescription: 0= Brown-out detect Enabled after powered on.
1= Brown-out detect Disabled after powered on.

subConfigs.name: CBOV
optionDescription: 00 = Brown-out voltage is 2.2V.
01 = Brown-out voltage is 2.7V.
10 = Brown-out voltage is 3.7V.
11 = Brown-out voltage is 4.5V.

subConfigs.name: CBORST
optionDescription: 0 = Brown-out reset Enabled after powered on.
1 = Brown-out reset Disabled after powered on.

subConfigs.name: ICELOCK
optionDescription: 0 = ICE can’t access Cortex® -M0 debug port.
1 = ICE can access Cortex® -M0 debug port.

subConfigs.name: CIOINI
optionDescription: 0 = All GPIO set as input tri-state mode after powered on.
1 = All GPIO set as Quasi-bidirectional mode after chip powered on.

subConfigs.name: CBS
optionDescription: 00 = Boot from LDROM with IAP mode
01 = Boot from LDROM without IAP mode.
10 = Boot from APROM with IAP mode.
11 = Boot from APROM without IAP mode.

subConfigs.name: CWDTEN[1:0]
subConfigs.description:
Watchdog Timer Hardware Enable Control Bits.
CWDTEN[2:0] is CONFIG0[31][4][3],
011 = WDT hardware enable function is active. WDT clock is always on except chip enters
Power-down mode. When chip enter Power-down mode, WDT clock is always on if
CWDTPDEN is 0 or WDT clock is controlled by OSC10K_EN (PWRCON[3]) if
CWDTPDEN is 1. Please refer to bit field description of CWDTPDEN.
111 = WDT hardware enable function is inactive.
Others = WDT hardware enable function is active. WDT clock is always on.

subConfigs.name: LOCK
optionDescription: 0 = Flash memory content is locked.
1 = Flash memory content is not locked.

subConfigs.name: DFEN
optionDescription: 0 = Data Flash Enabled.
1 = Data Flash Disabled.
